remarks: Anything times the zero vector is the zero vector.  Equation 1b of [Kreyszig] p. 51.  ( ~ hvmul0 analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 12-Jan-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.)
statement:
lmodvs0.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
lmodvs0.s $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
lmodvs0.k $e |- K = ( Base ` F ) $.
lmodvs0.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
lmodvs0 $p |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ X e. K ) -> ( X .x. .0. ) = .0. ) $.
